body:
Can we get rid of this warning message (at least until Spack mirrors are commonplace)?
```console
==> Installing foo
==> Searching for binary cache of foo
==> Warning: No Spack mirrors are currently configured
==> No binary for foo found: installing from source
```
### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
$ spack install foo
```
title: Warning: No Spack mirrors are currently configured
